alert.note: Alert for San Bernardino (California) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS LasVegas (Southern Nevada, Southeastern California, Northwestern Arizona)
info.headline: Flood Advisory issued May 20 at 4:42PM PDT until further notice by NWS LasVegas
info.description: ...FLOOD ADVISORY REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 6 PM PDT THIS EVENING... * WHAT...Flooding caused by excessive rainfall. * WHERE...San Bernardino County, California around Cima Road and I-15. * WHEN...Until 600 PM PDT. * IMPACTS...Minor flooding in low-lying and poor drainage areas. Rises in normally dry washes. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 442 PM PDT, Thunderstorms dissipated around the area of Cima Road and I-15 before 4 PM PDT, but runoff from the previous heavy rainfall will continue to impact secondary roads and washes over the northwest portion of the Mojave National Preserve and up to the Kingston Range Wilderness. - Some locations that will experience flooding include... Cima, Baker and Cima Road, Kingston Mine Road, Kelbaker road. - http://www.weather.gov/safety/flood
info.instruction: Turn around, don`t drown when encountering flooded roads. Most flood deaths occur in vehicles.
